metrics_preference.title: Metrics reporting preference
metrics_preference.description: Help improve CodeRibbon and contribute to academic usability research by enabling completely anonymous and non-identifiable usage reporting!

enum.description: Disabled - entire metrics system is disabled.
Send metrics events directly to official CodeRibbon metrics analysis server.
Store metrics events in RAM, which can then be exported to file.
Automatic: Use your preference for the editor Preferred Line Width
Automatic: Use the Minimum Characters Wide setting below
Manual: Use a specific number of panes.

pane_count_horizontal_min_chars.title: Automatic: Minimum Characters Wide
pane_count_horizontal_min_chars.description: Choose how many columns a patch needs to show at minimum in order to be useful. Please change the above setting to activate this.

pane_count_horizontal_number.title: Manual: Number of horizontal panes
pane_count_horizontal_number.description: Choose an exact number of patches to show per screen horizontally. Also is used as the fallback in case automatic width detection fails.

enum.description: [UNSUPPORTED] Fit max number of patches with minimum N lines per patch.
Use a specific number of vertical strips.

pane_count_vertical_number.title: Number of vertical strips
pane_count_vertical_number.description: How many vertical patches should new columns be initialized with?

pane_count_vertical_min_lines.title: Minimum Lines per Patch
pane_count_vertical_min_lines.description: Minimum number of lines for a single patch.
